messages: On #DCAllAccess, THE WILD STORM artist Jon Davis-Hunt explains the process of reimagining iconic WildStorm characters, and how birds influenced the new look of the Engineer! https://youtu.be/v8EWjeo5Kw8. THE WILD STORM: Character Redesigns. It's DC's newest pop-up imprint, and it's taken the world of comics by...well, you know. The Wild Storm #2 is on stands today and it continues the techno-conspiracy thrills of the previous issue while deepening the mystery and intrigue.

A search for black-market Monster Venom leads Kate Kane back to a painful place from her past in BATWOMAN #1. http://bit.ly/2mJg1vp. BATWOMAN #1 "The Many Arms Of Death" part one! At last-Batwoman is back in her own ongoing series! On the island nation of Coryana, anything goes for members of the criminal underworld...and during her lost years after being drummed out of the military, Kate Kane found a kind of refuge there.
Where there once was an astronaut named Adrianna, there is now only a void. Get THE WILD STORM #2 tomorrow! http://bit.ly/2nCgVJ4.
Angela Spica is a brilliant engineer, but her abilities are killing her in THE WILD STORM #2, available 3/15! http://bit.ly/2n2QNKN.

messages: A read-through of #DCRebirth's WONDER WOMAN VOL. 1: THE LIES reminds us it's one of Diana's most traumatic stories yet. http://bit.ly/2n3E6f3. Wonder Woman: The Story Keeps Changing. The story of any super hero is one of change. The moment when a hero gets their powers, the moment when they realize the cost and effects of using those powers, the moment when they understand how having powers gives them a life fundamentally different from those around them-it's all change.

Where did Diana really come from, and why can't she find home? It's time to start tearing down The Lies in #DCRebirth's WONDER WOMAN VOL. 1! http://bit.ly/2lRDeuI. WONDER WOMAN VOL. 1: THE LIES. New York Times best-selling writer Greg Rucka returns to WONDER WOMAN! After suffering an unimaginable loss, Diana must rebuild her mission as Earth's ultimate protector and champion. However, in the midst of her grief, her Lasso of Truth stopped working! Start down the rabbit hole as dark secrets f...

messages: After tonight's #LegendsOfTomorrow, #DCTV Couch Club tackles the big question: is Thawne redeemable? DON'T LAUGH. http://bit.ly/2mXUAsv. Timeline Photos.

In Hector Navarro's #DCTV news, #TheFlash is looking for Wally, #LegendsOfTomorrow meet Apollo 13, and Van is still the world's worst boss on #Powerless. #DCAllAccess https://youtu.be/nApxGruf_uo. LEGENDS Meets Apollo 13. Houston, we have a...new episode of #DCTV! Hector's having some problems with his clones, but it's nothing compared to what our small screen heroes are dealing with this week. Wally West is trapped in the Speed Force! The Legends of Tomorrow are lost in space! (Well, one of them is, at any rate.)

Out now: Barry and Wally dig into Reverse-Flash's Belle Reve past in THE FLASH #18. Sounds like a safe place to take kids! http://bit.ly/2moQrxf. The Flash (2016-) #18 - DC Entertainment. "SINS OF THE FATHER" part one! With his superhero career finally underway, Wally West must learn the truth about his father, Daniel West, the long-lost villain known as Reverse-Flash. To retrace his steps, Kid Flash and The Flash must travel to the most dangerous place in the DC Universe: Belle Reve...

On #DCAllAccess, THE FLASH writer Josh Williamson drops some hints about Barry and Wally's new adventure: digging up family secrets at Belle Reve! https://youtu.be/dQ4AZ09g4WI. THE FLASH: Reverse-Flash Haunts Kid Flash. Kid Flash is one of the fastest heroes alive... so what's keeping him from moving forward? In this DC All Access comics clip, we talk to Flash writer Joshua Williamson about "Sins of the Father," the dramatic new storyline that kicks off today.

Ollie may have martial arts mastery and unrivaled aim, but Barry is...well, the World's Fastest Man.

I'm trying to thaw out from the frigid Midwest cold and ice, but ready to bring this column to you.I guess the best place to start would be with the obvious: Laurel!

DC's Rebirth has launched some amazing new chapters in the lives of classic super heroes, and Barry Allen has got a really, really special story! The first trade collection by Joshua Williamson with art by Carmine Di Giandomenico and Ivan Plascencia generously collects THE FLASH: REBIRTH one-shot an...

#DCTV Couch Club looks at how a powerless Kara still manages to be extraordinary on the mid-season return of #SupergirlCW, directed by Kevin Smith. Plus, find out what tonight's episode has to do with that unproduced Superman movie Smith wrote in the '90s! http://bit.ly/2kbCcZk. Timeline Photos.

Kevin Smith just stands around in rooms awkwardly waiting to talk to Hector Navarro about tonight's mid-season return of #SupergirlCW! Yes, after a long, heartbreaking hiatus, DC's full slate of super hero shows returns this week with new episodes of The Flash, DC's Legends of Tomorrow, Arrow, Gotham, Lucifer and Supergirl. And speaking of the last one, did you know that tonight's episode was directed by Kevin Smith.....

A new vigilante just showed up in GREEN ARROW #15, and they could turn the tide in the fight to save Seattle! http://bit.ly/2jIYzaz. This Just Happened: Green Arrow Sees Red. Seattle's a great city, but in the pages of this week's GREEN ARROW #15, it's also a city under siege, and the one man who can help has seen his life destroyed and his reputation tarnished. Much of it has been at the hands of Queen Industries CFO Cyrus Broderick, who orchestrated Oliver's profession...

Chapter-by-Chapter: Green Arrow Vol. 1. When I was sent the first volume of GREEN ARROW: REBIRTH and asked to share my thoughts on it for the DC website, I was pretty psyched. I write about Arrow for the #DCTV Couch Club, and I've been wanting to read the new Green Arrow book for a while, so everything aligned perfectly.

Trapped in the Shadowlands, the greatest foe keeping Barry and Wally from escaping is Iris! Read THE FLASH #12, available on digital! http://bit.ly/2hAPUUi. The Flash #12. "SPEED OF DARKNESS" part three! Time is running out for The Flash and Kid Flash as they race to help the Shade regain control of the Shadowlands, the dimension of pure darkness from which the Shade draws his terrible power, before it reaches our world and consumes the light forever.

When Central City CSI investigator Barry Allen is struck by lightning in a freak particle accel-erator accident, he awakens after nine months in a coma to discover something extraordinary: he has gained the power to travel at speeds far beyond that of a normal person, transforming him into the Fastest Man Alive. Taking a cue from his friend and ally â the Starling City hero known as Arrow â Barry now uses his superhuman abilities to help protect the people of Central City from a rogues gallery of villains â many from across the DC Universe. And this fall, heâs racing onto television screens across the nation in the all-new television series The Flash!

DC Comics has been part of New York City - and vice versa - for decades. As we prepare to complete the move to our Burbank headquarters we want to thank the people of New York and all those who have worked in the office there for being an important part of our history. It's never easy to say goodbye but we are excited about the future and everything it holds.

We're trying but we just can't come up with a word for how great this statue looks. Feel free to offer adjective suggestions in the comments, because wow.  Kotobukiya. Created by artist Bob Kane and writer Bill Finger Batman has been thrilling readers young and old alike for 75 years. To commemorate this milestone anniversary Kotobukiya has created an extremely limited edition ARTFX+ statue of the “Bat-Man” as he first appeared in Detective Comics issue #27. 

Masterfully sculpted by Atelier Bamboo, Batman stands in 1/10th scale and includes a magnetic display base for effortless display options. This first appearance of Batman will be available exclusively during San Diego Comic-Con 2014 and thru a limited kotous.com non-attendee pre-order event.

Pre-orders will open up at 10AM on Friday, June 27th PST at store.kotous.com.
